The Sip Membership
Your Passport to Premium Tequila. Normally $149/year, save $50 when you join today and receive free shipping, exclusive gifts, and VIP access to promotions & events. Elevate your tequila journey today.
JOIN NOW & UNLOCK BENEFITS
★★★★★ Industry-Approved. Customer-Loved.
Why Join The Sip Membership?
For a limited time, for
just $99/year
($149 value), you’ll unlock a world of exclusive perks designed to elevate your tequila experience.
Free Shipping on Every Order over $99
Enjoy free standard shipping on all domestic US orders over $99— no hassle
Receive Seasonal Gifts with Purchase
Four times a year, we send a little something extra—member gifts valued up to $40 with your purchase
Free Engraving on Select Bottles
Personalize your tequila bottles with complimentary engraving—perfect for gifts or your own collection
Member-Only Products
Gain access to The SIP Vault, where you’ll find small-batch, limited-edition tequilas and exclusive collections available only to members
Invitations to VIP Events
Get exclusive access to curated virtual and in-person events, including tastings, masterclasses, and more
Member-Only Discounts & Promotions
Enjoy special flash sales, extended happy hours, and early access to new product drops
Priority Concierge Support
Skip the line with dedicated customer service for all your tequila needs
JOIN NOW
Members-Only Access to The Vault
Unlock a secret collection of ultra-exclusive tequilas, limited releases, and collector’s editions—only available to members.
Siembra ALTENO Reposado
Fortaleza / Sip Tequila Single Barrel Reposado
Tequila Ocho Añejo Widow Jane Barrel Select
Tres Cuatro Cinco Extra Añejo Tequila
What Our Customers Are Saying
“The tastings and early access events are such a cool bonus, and their support team is super quick when you need help.”
Nina R.
“I’ve personalized bottles for gifts and they always impress—plus The Vault has some seriously rare finds.””
Marcus J.
“The free shipping and surprise gifts make every order feel like a win—I look forward to these drops every time.”
Alyssa D.
this season’s complimentary gift

Membership
Simple & Seamless Sign-Up

Click Join Now & Add Membership to Your Cart.
Complete Your Secure Checkout.
Unlock Instant Access to Perks & Benefits!
JOIN NOW
Frequently Asked Questions
Where can I access my Member Portal?
You can always access your Member portal by clicking
here
.
How do I join Membership?
Add Membership to your cart and go through checkout (like any other purchase). After checkout, you’ll receive an onboarding email or sms that explains how to access member benefits.
Do I need to have an account to access membership?
Yes. Once you sign up, you’ll be prompted to create an account (or sign in to your existing account). Use the same email or phone number (we recommend you provide both)  that you used to purchase Membership. This is how you will access your benefits when checking out and manage your membership.
How do I access The Vault and other member-only products?
In order to access The Vault and Member-Only products, you will be given access to a private collection when it's opened and available to shop. While The Vault is now members only-it is still first come, first serve. In order to not miss these exclusive drops, make sure you are signed up today.
Wiil my Member benefits work with my Tequila Club or Subscription purchase?
At this time, Sip Membership benefits will apply to your first initial subscription purchase but
WILL NOT
apply to your future recurring shipments. However, this is something we’re actively working on, as we want to provide added value for those who shop with us through subscriptions as well. Stay tuned—we’re excited about what’s to come!
What’s the difference between The Sip Membership and the Tequila Club?
The Sip Membership and the Tequila Club are two different ways to enjoy Sip Tequila—each with its own perks depending on how you like to shop.
The
Sip Membership
is an annual paid program ($149/year) designed for customers who like to choose their own bottles and shop à la carte throughout the year. Members get exclusive benefits like free standard shipping on all orders, access to seasonal gifts, complimentary engraving on select bottles, early access to limited releases via The SIP Vault, special promotions, and invites to member-only events.
The
Tequila Club
is our subscription-based offering, where you receive curated tequila shipments every one, two, or three months. You pick the tier and frequency, and we handle the rest—introducing you to new bottles and limited selections with every delivery. It’s a great way to explore a variety of tequilas without having to choose them yourself.
How do I receive free engraving and how many bottles can I engrave with my Membership?
Free engraving on eligible bottles is applied directly at checkout when you are logged into your account. Members can engrave up to 2 order per order. 8x per year ($200 value).
How do I redeem my free seasonal gift?
Each season, Sip Members receive a complimentary gift with purchase ($60 min) each season (4x/year) as part of your benefits. We will email you after signing up with a link to add this gift to your cart and when a new gift is launched each season—just make sure you’re signed up to receive SMS messages from us. We’ll send a direct link to the seasonal gift along with your code straight to your phone for easy access.
Simply add the product to your cart and apply your discount code at checkout. Be sure to use your Membership phone number or email address and apply the discount code. The code is valid only when used with your Membership account and requires a min $60 one-time purchase to redeem. Gift cannot be applied to subscription purchases-including Tequila Club.  You can redeem one gift per quarter, and the benefit resets on January 1st, April 1st, July 1st, and October 1st each year.
Is the membership fee a recurring charge?
Members pay $149 each year for access to the membership program. The membership will auto-renew annually until you decide to cancel. You can cancel your membership’s auto-renewal at any time through your
account portal
or by contacting info@siptequila.com.
Will I keep my discount when my membership renews?
While you can save $50 for a limited time and enjoy all The Sip Membership benefits for the year - your membership will return to the non-discounted $149 price upon renewal.
Can I pause my membership?
No, we do not support pausing or skipping your membership at this time. However, you can cancel and rejoin the membership at any time.
Can I return my membership or request a refund?
All purchases of the membership are final and cannot be returned or refunded. You can cancel your membership auto-renewal from your
account portal
at any time or by contacting our customer support team at info@siptequila.com. If canceled, your membership will remain active until the end of the billing period.

Subscription Terms
Subscriptions will be a recurring charge based on delivery frequency and product selection.
By providing your account information, you authorize Sip Tequila (ST Online, Inc.) to charge your credit card for costs associated with any shipments. These costs may include shipping fees and state taxes where applicable.
Subscriptions require a commitment of two shipments.
It is the members responsibility to notify Sip Tequila of cancellations, address changes, or credit card updates no later than 2 weeks prior to any club shipment.

Weekly Events
Every week, Sip Tequila hosts classes and tastings involving every aspect of Agave spirits and beyond. Top Tequila brand education, mixology classes, influencer meetups and more are all included on the weekly schedule. Sign up now to be notified of upcoming events!
BLIND TASTING: ANEJO
Saturday, September 6th,  5pm-7pm
Here at Sip Tequila, we are taking away the labels and hiding the fancy bottles as we want our guests to experience a tasting with just you and your own unique palate. No one telling you tasting notes to look for, others swaying your opinion, which distillery is "better" than the other.. Five exceptional Anejo's will be lined up for you to sample and take your vote. Once all guests are finished sampling, all bottles will be unveiled for you to discover your favorite.
Discover how YOU like to Sip Tequila.
MUST BE 21+ TO ATTEND.
BUY YOUR TICKET
Supplier Showcase: CasAzar Tequila
Friday Sept. 12th | 6-8pm
"In a world that blends in, CasAzar chooses to stand out. Born from the fusion of roots and fortune – “Casa” means home, the foundation where your story begins, while “Azar” embodies luck, the exhilarating thrill of taking a chance. CasAzar is the tequila made for those who approach life like a game of high-stakes poker – fearless, driven, and willing to embrace risks.
So, pour a glass, raise it high, and bet on yourself."
Join us and Viviana as we walk through the Pa'Lante lineup along with cocktails and light bites for the evening.
MUST BE 21+ TO ATTEND.
$25.00
BUY YOUR TICKET
Supplier Showcase: Matasanta Mezcal
Friday, September 19th 6pm-8pm
"The origin of MATASANTA is a story of serendipity of Oaxaca's mesmerizing coast.
During the height of the pandemic, through the inspiration from other Matas Santas we ended up doing the first road trip from Miami to Puerto Escondido.
It is easy, almost natural to be allured by the surf and sunsets in la Punta Zicatela, the hippie vibe of Mazunte, the diversity of Zipotile, the views of Roca Blanca, the wild nature in Ventanilla, and so on... "
Join us and Daniel as he walks us through Matasanta. Enjoy light bites and welcome cocktail as you prepare yourself for a night of good libations
MUST BE 21+ TO ATTEND
$25.00
BUY YOUR TICKET
Sip Tequila Fest 2026
Saturday, January 31st, 1PM - 5PM
BUY YOUR TICKET
Weekly Events

About Us
About SipTequila
Tequila is at the height of its popularity worldwide, and here at
SipTequila
, not only do we make it more accessible to you, we make the world more accessible for the producers themselves. The celebrated producers listed on our site represent the spirit of the
Jalisco region
, and meet strict criteria for authentic production. Together, we believe in time-honored traditions, innovators, and attention to detail: things that can only be found with hearts, eyes, and boots on the ground in Mexico itself. Our team bridges borders and is always on the lookout for unique products, loved by the American community.
We look forward to sharing a true Tequila experience with you. Salud!
Our Team
Who is behind SipTequila? Learn more about our team. We love Tequila - and we know you do too!
Learn More
How it Works
✱  Shop
Choose from our handpicked selection of boutique tequilas. Shop for yourself or a special someone.
✱  Ship
Fast delivery with premium packaging. Receive your order shipped direct to your door - or to a gift recipient.
✱  Sip
Enjoy your new tequila or indulge in a special tequila subscription to enjoy with ease. And, pick your next bottle!
✱  Gift
Give the perfect gift for the tequila fan in your life with our premium, hand-selected gift bundles.
─ Ready to Explore?
Shop Our Best Sellers
Shop Now
